attributes.action: cancel the tv licence if the BBC is found to have covered up the Jimmy Savile allegations.
attributes.additional_details:
If the BBC is found to have covered up the dreadful allegations against Jimmy Savile and members off staff found to have taken part and covered up for him. I don't feel that the British public should be made to support this organisation.
The government should cancel the TV licence and allow the rotten BBC to fend for themselves.
